title: Bug 103963: Missing friendly error message when there is no data for series
OB: No friendly error message is displayed when there is no data for a series in the Preview. Instead, no error message is shown.
EB: The software should display a friendly error message to notify the user when there is no data available for a series in the Preview.
SR:
1. Launch the software.
2. Go to the Preview section.
3. Navigate to a series with no data available.
4. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed.
